questions.text: Is your business registered with MCA (Ministry of Corporate Affairs)?
How many employees does your organization have?
Is your organization registered with ESI?
Is your organization registered with EPFO?
Do you have a valid Shops & Establishment License or Factory License?
Do you contribute to Labour Welfare Fund where applicable?
Are you compliant with Professional Tax requirements?
Are employee salaries compliant with minimum wage laws?
Do you follow the Wage Protection Scheme (WPS)?
Do you have a written HR policy communicated to all employees?
Are basic policies (leave, holidays, work hours, code of conduct) defined?
What type of attendance system do you maintain?
Are employee leave records properly maintained?
Are mandatory labour records (Forms A, B, C, H, K) maintained?
Do you issue Form 16 and file TDS for applicable employees?
Are statutory dues (PF/ESIC/PT/Gratuity) remitted on time?
Is an Internal Complaints Committee (ICC) formed under POSH Act?
Have you conducted an annual labour audit?
